outputs.output_descr: Harnessing extractives industries to advance human development has become a top priority at national, regional and pan-African levels. The project aims to address the risks and opportunities associated with the boom in the mining sector, especially in oil and gas, in a growing number of African countries.  Building on UNDP's Extractive Industries Framework, the project targets the governance, accountability and transparency environment related to the extractive industries and will facilitate the implementation of the African Union's Mining Vision, including the establishment of the African Mineral Development Centre as the central and strategic coordinating body.

project_descr: The project aims to address the risks and opportunities associated with the boom in the mining sector in African countries.  The project targets the governance, accountability and transparency and will facilitate implementation of the AU's Mining Vision.
project_title: Harnessing Extractive Industries for Human Dev. (RBA)
